event.title: made famous by the movie Top Gun in 1986

data.event: Miramar was the site of the real TOPGUN made famous by the movie Top Gun in 1986.

event.title: was realigned by the Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) program in 1995

data.event: NAS Miramar was realigned by the Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) program in 1995 and turned over to the Marine Corps as a fixed wing and helicopter base in 1999.

event.title: turned over to the Marine Corps as a fixed wing and helicopter base in 1999

data.event: NAS Miramar was realigned by the Base Realignment and Closure (BRAC) program in 1995 and turned over to the Marine Corps as a fixed wing and helicopter base in 1999.
